data.eml:eml: Cyrtodactylus samroiyot, a new limestone-dwelling Bent-toed Gecko (Squamata: Gekkonidae) from Prachuap Khiri Khan Province, peninsular Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pauwels, Olivier S. G., Sumontha, Montri (2014): Cyrtodactylus samroiyot, a new limestone-dwelling Bent-toed Gecko (Squamata: Gekkonidae) from Prachuap Khiri Khan Province, peninsular Thailand. Zootaxa 3755 (6): 573-583, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3755.6.4
